title: Searching for a International Team
body:
You are Diamond or Challenger and are interested in a Team that will go professional ? 
Banzai Gaming is looking for a International Team, maybe we are Looking for you.
We are looking for a complete new team, that means we need 2 person of all rolles to form a main Team and a Team of substitutes.
The Training and gaming will start if we have all 10 Members of this Team.

What will Banzai Gaming and I do for you ? 
We are will Coach and train you that you can get to the Top.
First of all the Teams need to get Ranked and ready for competion.
If the Team goes well we are looking for sponsors etc.

You are Interested in it ? Then leave me an email.
amokleben@gmx.net

Cya soon Summoners ^^
